long_description: The Freestyle Mariner Tide Watch puts ocean knowledge at surfers' fingertips with tide direction, time and height for 150 beaches worldwide, in addition to sunrise and sunset times. Beyond the surfing focus, this watch is an asset to boaters, sailors, fishermen and divers who depend on tide, sunrise and sunset data. Date; alarm; stopwatch; countdown timer; backlight. 50mm case and a comfortable, durable silicone band offer a great fit for large wrists. The Freestyle Mariner Tide Watch is water-resistant to 100m (330 ft.) and features waterproof buttons.
short_description: The Freestyle Mariner Tide Watch puts ocean knowledge at surfers' fingertips with tide direction, time and height for 150 beaches worldwide, in addition to sunrise and sunset times.
